title: AMERICAN HORROR STORY: True Crimes That Inspired Hotel
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: I think Lady Gaga's character was also inspired by Ann Hamilton Byrne who had a cult of children called "The Family"
hotel is one of the BEST seasons it’s amazing
I believe that Alieen Wornos first victim did attack her and she did kill him in self defense. I think she then got a taste for murder and purposely went after the other men she killed.

One of The Countess’ biggest inspirations actually comes from the movie “The Hunger”.

The main premise includes a vampiric blood disorder, artsy imagery, and one main vampire that wanted to keep her top spot.
description:
Here are the true stories that inspired major plot points in AHS Hotel including James Patrick March, The Hotel Cortez, The Countess and more. 

In this video, Greg breaks down how AHS Season 5's most iconic characters were inspired by real-life figures and horrific crime stories.

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe!
